title: Flying Disc
description: A flying disc, more commonly known as a frisbee. Used in the sport of Ultimate or disc golf.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the flying disc emoji is rendered as a sleek, aerodynamic disc with a vibrant, almost electric blue hue, showcasing Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and precise, rounded edges. Realistic lighting creates a sense of motion and depth, making it appear ready to soar through the air. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for conveying fun, recreation, outdoor activities, or a sense of playful speed and excitement in digital messages.
